description.value:
An inix, also called a dune behemoth, is a long, lowslung reptile with bony plates on its back. It is strong and spirited. An inix rarely eats anything as large as a humanoid, but it does not shy away from a fight. Standard Actions Triggered Actions Published in Dark Sun Campaign Setting, page(s) 123.

An inix, also called a dune behemoth, is a long, lowslung reptile with bony plates on its back. It is strong and spirited. An inix rarely eats anything as large as a humanoid, but it does not shy away from a fight.

Standard Actions

Triggered ActionsPublished in Dark Sun Campaign Setting, page(s) 123.
